Sigerson Morrison is a luxury footwear brand renowned for its stylish, high-quality shoes. From classic pumps to modern sandals, the brand offers a range of timeless designs crafted with the finest materials.

t: Sigerson Morrison Becomes the Latest Brand to Close Stores to Focus on Digital
s: May 24, 2017 - Sigerson Morrison — founded by designers Kari Sigerson and Miranda Morrison in 1991 — joins a growing list of brands and retailers who have shuttered brick-and-mortar locations in order to shift resources online.
